Name: gold
Description: Gold pieces, these can be exchanged for goods with vendors

Name: ale
Description: An alcoholic beverage made from grains

Name: apple
Description: A fruit that comes in red, yellow, and green varieties

Name: battleaxe
Description: A large broad-bladed axe

Name: blanket
Description: A warm and fairly comfortable wool blanket

Name: bone
Description: A rigid organ that constitutes part of the vertebrate skeleton in animals

Name: bread
Description: A baked food prepared from a dough of flour and water

Name: cheese
Description: A dairy product that forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein

Name: common clothes
Description: A set of clothes consisting of a loose shirt and baggy breeches

Name: dagger
Description: A short knife with a pointed and edged blade, used as a weapon

Name: egg
Description: The unfertilized egg of a chicken

Name: fancy clothes
Description: A set of clothes is designed specifically to be expensive and to show it

Name: fish
Description: A gill-bearing aquatic craniate animals that lack limbs with digits

Name: fishing pole
Description: A long, flexible rod used by fishermen to catch fish

Name: greatsword
Description: A heavy sword which possesses a large grip for leverage

Name: health potion
Description: A vial of transparent red liquid which increases your health by 20 upon drinking

Name: jerky
Description: Lean trimmed meat that has been cut into strips and dried

Name: longsword
Description: A sword characterized as having a cruciform hilt with a grip

Name: milk
Description: A nutrient-rich liquid food produced by cows

Name: pie
Description: A baked dish which is usually made of a pastry dough casing that contains an assorment of fruit

Name: raw meat
Description: The uncooked flesh of an animal

Name: rope
Description: A group of fibers that are braided together into a larger and stronger form

Name: sausage
Description: A meat product made from ground meat, salt, and spices

Name: shortbow
Description: A ranged weapon system consisting of an elastic launching device (bow) and long-shafted projectiles (arrows)

Name: steak
Description: Meat sliced across the muscle fibers and cooked to perfection

Name: stew
Description: A combination of solid food ingredients that have been cooked in liquid and served in the resultant gravy

Name: water
Description: A colorless, tasteless liquid

Name: wine
Description: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grape juice

Name: wolf pelt
Description: The fur of a wolf
